title: Restore JaCoCo coverage threshold to 50%

description: Account types, holdings allocation, and snapshots.

title: Milestone 2: Employment & Income
description: Employment list, employer forms, income forms, and matching policy display.

title: Milestone 1: Reference Data & Person
description:
Person forms, marriage history display, and contribution limits viewer.

**Testing Requirements:**
- 60%+ line coverage (Vitest)
- Component tests for all forms
- Hook tests for API queries

**Deliverable:** Can create persons, view contribution limits by year

title: Milestone 5: Projections
description: Projection form, charts, and scenario comparison views.

title: Milestone 3: Accounts & Holdings
description: Account list, forms, holdings editor, and summary cards.

title: Milestone 4: Contributions & Paychecks
description: Election form, paycheck list, contribution history, and limits display.

title: Milestone 5: Projections
description: Multi-year projection engine and scenario comparison.

title: Milestone 4: Contributions & Paychecks
description: Contribution elections, paycheck recording, and contribution calculations.

title: Milestone 2: Employment & Income
description: Employers, matching policies, employment history, and income tracking.

title: V3 Migration: employers, employment, and income tables
description:
Create Flyway migration for M2 tables:
- employers (id, name, ein, address fields)
- matching_policies (employer_id, match_percent, match_limit_percent, vesting_schedule)
- employments (id, person_id, employer_id, start_date, end_date, job_title, is_current)
- incomes (id, employment_id, income_type, amount, frequency, effective_date)

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Tables created with proper constraints
- Foreign keys to persons table
- Indexes on frequently queried columns

title: Employer entity, repository, and service
description:
Create Employer domain:
- Employer entity with embedded MatchingPolicy
- EmployerRepository with Spring Data JPA
- EmployerService interface and implementation
- EmployerDto and CreateEmployerRequest DTOs

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Full CRUD operations
- Matching policy embedded in employer
- 80%+ test coverage

title: Employment entity, repository, and service
description:
Create Employment domain (links Person to Employer):
- Employment entity with person_id, employer_id, dates, job_title
- EmploymentRepository
- EmploymentService interface and implementation
- EmploymentDto and CreateEmploymentRequest DTOs

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Links person to employer with date range
- Tracks current vs past employment
- 80%+ test coverage

title: Income entity, repository, and service
description:
Create Income domain:
- Income entity (employment_id, type, amount, frequency)
- IncomeType enum (SALARY, BONUS, COMMISSION, etc.)
- PayFrequency enum (WEEKLY, BIWEEKLY, SEMIMONTHLY, MONTHLY)
- IncomeRepository and IncomeService
- IncomeDto and CreateIncomeRequest DTOs

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Supports multiple income types per employment
- Frequency-based calculations
- 80%+ test coverage

title: Employer REST controller and endpoints
description:
Create Employer API endpoints:
- GET /api/v1/employers - list all
- GET /api/v1/employers/{id} - get by ID
- POST /api/v1/employers - create
- PUT /api/v1/employers/{id} - update
Include matching policy in responses.

title: Employment REST controller and endpoints
Income REST controller and endpoints
Milestone 1: Reference Data & Person
description:
Person management, marriages, and contribution limits reference data.

**Testing Requirements:**
- 60%+ line coverage (JaCoCo)
- Integration tests for all endpoints
- Repository layer unit tests

**Deliverable:** Can create persons, view contribution limits by year

title: V1 Migration: persons and marriages tables
description:
Create Flyway V1 migration with:
- persons table (id UUID PK, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, filing_status, state_of_residence)
- marriages table (id UUID PK, person1_id FK, person2_id FK, marriage_date, divorce_date, status, notes)
- Proper indexes and constraints

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Migration runs successfully
- Tables have appropriate indexes
- Foreign keys properly constrained

title: V2 Migration: contribution limits reference tables
description:
Create Flyway V2 migration with:
- contribution_limits table (year, account_type, limit_type, amount)
- phase_out_ranges table (year, filing_status, account_type, magi_start, magi_end)
- high_earner_threshold table (year, amount)
- Seed with 2025/2026 limits data

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Tables created with appropriate constraints
- 2025 limits data seeded
- 2026 estimated limits seeded

title: Person entity, repository, and service
description:
Implement Person domain:
- Person JPA entity with all fields from spec
- FilingStatus enum
- PersonRepository with Spring Data JPA
- PersonService with CRUD operations
- PersonDto and CreatePersonRequest DTOs

**Testing:**
- Unit tests for service layer
- Repository integration tests

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Entity maps correctly to persons table
- All CRUD operations work
- 60%+ test coverage

title: Marriage entity, repository, and service
description:
Implement Marriage domain:
- Marriage JPA entity with all fields from spec
- MarriageStatus enum (MARRIED, DIVORCED, WIDOWED)
- MarriageRepository with Spring Data JPA
- MarriageService with CRUD operations
- MarriageDto and CreateMarriageRequest DTOs

**Testing:**
- Unit tests for service layer
- Repository integration tests

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Entity maps correctly to marriages table
- Can track marriage history for a person
- 60%+ test coverage

title: ContributionLimits entity and service
description:
Implement contribution limits reference data:
- ContributionLimit entity
- PhaseOutRange entity
- HighEarnerThreshold entity
- LimitType enum (BASE, CATCHUP_50, CATCHUP_60_63, EMPLOYER_TOTAL)
- AccountType enum (from spec)
- ContributionLimitsRepository
- ContributionLimitsService with queries by year and account type

**Testing:**
- Unit tests for service layer
- Repository integration tests

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Can query limits by year
- Can query limits by year + account type
- Phase-out ranges accessible
- 60%+ test coverage

title: Person REST controller and endpoints
description:
Implement Person REST API:
- POST /api/v1/persons - Create person
- GET /api/v1/persons/{id} - Get person with accounts
- PUT /api/v1/persons/{id} - Update person
- GET /api/v1/persons - List persons (paginated)

**Testing:**
- Controller unit tests with MockMvc
- Integration tests with TestRestTemplate

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- All endpoints work per spec
- Proper validation and error responses
- OpenAPI documentation generated

title: Marriage REST controller and endpoints
description:
Implement Marriage REST API:
- POST /api/v1/persons/{id}/marriages - Record marriage
- PUT /api/v1/marriages/{id} - Update marriage (e.g., record divorce)
- GET /api/v1/persons/{id}/marriages - List marriage history

**Testing:**
- Controller unit tests with MockMvc
- Integration tests

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- All endpoints work per spec
- Proper validation for dates
- Can track full marriage history

title: Limits REST controller and endpoints
description:
Implement Limits REST API:
- GET /api/v1/limits/{year} - Get all limit rules for a year
- GET /api/v1/limits/{year}/{accountType} - Get limits for specific account type

**Testing:**
- Controller unit tests with MockMvc
- Integration tests

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Returns all limits by year
- Returns account-specific limits
- Includes phase-out ranges in response
